title: White bean, potato, spinach soup
author: 58c039018060197ca0b52d4a
steps: Heat 2 tablespoons oil in a medium saucepan over medium-high heat until shimmering.
Add onions, celery, garlic, and rosemary. Cook, stirring frequently, until onions and garlic are softened but not browned, about 4 minutes.
Add broth, bay leaves and beans. Bring to a boil, reduce to a bare simmer and cook for 10 minutes. Add spinach and continue cooking until completely wilted, about 5 minutes longer.
Season to taste with salt and pepper.
Stir in lemon juice. Serve immediately, drizzling remaining olive oil over bowls.
